name: E O A Perera Theatre
description: We are proud to have completed the installation of a state-of-the-art lighting control system at the E. O. E. Perera Theatre, located within the Engineering Faculty of the University of Peradeniya. This iconic theatre, with a seating capacity of 542, now features a modern, intuitive lighting system designed to support a wide range of academic and cultural events. Our installation enhances both the functionality and flexibility of the venue, offering seamless control and ambiance adjustment for lectures, performances, and presentations.

name: Auditorium at ICBT Campus
description: We installed an advanced state-of-the-art lighting control system at the auditorium of ICBT Campus, Kurunegala. Designed to enhance both energy efficiency and user convenience, this intelligent system allows seamless control over the auditorium’s lighting environment—perfect for lectures, presentations, and events.

name: Worship Hall At JCC
scope: Lighting control System & LED Moon Light
description: We designed and installed a custom moonlight LED panel to softly illuminate the statue in the worship hall, enhancing the serene and spiritual atmosphere. The setup includes a smart lighting control system for easy scene adjustment, dimming, and scheduling — all tailored to the centre’s ceremonial needs. Respectful. Refined. Precisely controlled.

name: Airport Cargo Building
description: Onco Solutions successfully completed the installation of a modern linear lighting system combined with Philips luminaires at the Cargo Building of Bandaranaike International Airport. The project enhances visibility, improves energy efficiency, and supports 24/7 operations with a durable, low-maintenance lighting solution. Designed to meet international standards, this upgrade ensures safer, more efficient cargo handling while aligning with the airport’s modernization goals.

name: Barcelo - Nasadura Palace
description: Onco Solutions completed the installation of a smart lighting control system at Barceló Násandhura Palace Hotel, covering both general areas and banquet halls. The system offers seamless control, energy efficiency, and customizable ambiance, enhancing the hotel's guest experience while supporting smooth day-to-day operations.

name: Auditorium at University of Rajarata
scope: Lighting, audio, stage lighting & projector system
description: Onco Solutions successfully completed the installation of a state-of-the-art lighting, audio, stage lighting, and projector system at the auditorium of the University of Rajarata, Sri Lanka. This upgrade enhances the venue's functionality and atmosphere, creating an immersive experience for academic events, performances, and presentations.

name: Auditorium at University of Kelaniya
scope: Lighting, audio, stage lighting & projector system
description: Onco Solutions successfully completed the installation of a state-of-the-art lighting, audio, stage lighting, and projector system at the auditorium of the University of Kelaniya, Sri Lanka. This upgrade enhances the venue's functionality and atmosphere, creating an immersive experience for academic events, performances, and presentations.

name: Maitland Cresent Banquet
scope: LED RGB Lighting, DMX control, linear lighting & lighting control System
description: Onco Solutions successfully completed the supply, programming, installation, and commissioning of an advanced lighting control system for general lighting, DMX control, and RGB linear lighting at the Sri Lanka Army’s Maitland Crescent Banquet Hall. The solution delivered dynamic ambiance and precise control, enhancing both the functionality and visual impact of the venue.
